item.title: A Flexible, Equivariant Framework for Subgraph GNNs via Graph Products and Graph Coarsening
item.description: Flexible Subgraph GNNs, achieving scalability via graph products and coarsening, consistently outperform baselines and adapt to varying subgraph numbers.

item.title: Classification Diffusion Models: Revitalizing Density Ratio Estimation
item.description: Classification Diffusion Models (CDMs) revolutionize density ratio estimation by integrating the strengths of diffusion models and classifiers, achieving state-of-the-art image generation and likeliho…

item.title: Image-aware Evaluation of Generated Medical Reports
item.description: VLScore: a novel image-aware metric revolutionizes medical report evaluation by jointly assessing textual and visual similarities, significantly improving alignment with radiologist assessments.

item.title: Incentivizing Quality Text Generation via Statistical Contracts
item.description: Cost-robust contracts, inspired by statistical hypothesis tests, incentivize quality in LLM text generation, overcoming the moral hazard of pay-per-token models.

item.title: Semantics and Spatiality of Emergent Communication
item.description: Emergent communication protocols are surprisingly inconsistent; this paper proves reconstruction-based objectives yield semantically consistent protocols, unlike discrimination-based ones, highlightin…

item.title: Unsupervised Discovery of Formulas for Mathematical Constants
item.description: AI automates mathematical constant formula discovery by analyzing convergence dynamics, revealing known and novel formulas for œÄ, ln(2), and other constants.
